IMUSim
Package imusim :: Package algorithms :: Module vector_observation :: Class LeastSquaresOptimalVectorObservation

Class LeastSquaresOptimalVectorObservation

source code

Base class of least squares optimal vector observation algorithms

Implementations provide optimal solutions to Wahba's loss function. See G. Wahba "A Least Squares Estimate of Satellite Attitude" SIAM review v.7 pp 384-386 1965

Method Details

__init__(self, refs=None, weights=None, inclinationAngle=None)
(Constructor)

source code 

Initialise vector observation algorithm.

The set of reference vectors for the vector observation process can be supplied directly, or an magnetic field inclination angle can be supplied to indicate that the reference vectors should be the Earth gravitational and magnetic fields.

An optional weights list can be supplied to support weighting of reference vectors when calculating the Wahba loss function.

Parameters:
  • refs - list of reference vectors (3x1 np.ndarray)
  • weights - list of reference vector wieghts (float)
  • inclinationAngle - inclination angle of magnetic field (float)
Overrides: object.__init__
